channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 32 Delightful Gift Ideas for Music Lovers and Audiophiles
item.description: From headphones and speakers to accessories for their vinyl LPs, these picks will appeal to any audio aficionado.

item.title: JubileeTV Review: Video Calls and Remote Support for Elders
item.description: The JubileeTV is a set-top box and camera for seniors that offers remote tech support, video calls, and medication reminders.

item.title: 18 Giftable Subscription Boxes (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We have options for plant lovers, foodies, pet owners—and even those who are hard to shop for—with these gifts that keep on giving.
